changeSet.comment: Update last_sequence_used of existing entries in key_sequence_register by looking up in NAMES table
changeSet.sql: UPDATE key_sequence_register SET last_used_sequence = COALESCE((SELECT REPLACE(UPPER(nval), key_prefix, '')+0 as last_used_number FROM names WHERE names.nval LIKE concat(key_prefix, '%') AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from germplsm g where g.gid = names.gid and g.deleted = 1) ORDER BY last_used_number desc LIMIT 1), 0);
